remarks: Closure of join of elements in the domain.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
statement:
joincl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
joincl.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
joincl.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
joincl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
joincl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
joincl.e $e |- ( ph -> <. X , Y >. e. dom .\/ ) $.
joincl $p |- ( ph -> ( X .\/ Y ) e. B ) $.
